summary: To get the information of shop penalty
description: To get the information of shop penalty.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/account_health/get_shop_performance?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: rating
schema.description: Overall Performance: Poor = 1 ImprovementNeeded = 2 Good = 3 Excellent = 4

schema.name: fulfillment_failed
schema.description: The number of metrics that did not meet target under Fulfillment Performance type.

schema.name: listing_failed
schema.description: The number of metrics that did not meet target under Listing Performance type.

schema.name: custom_service_failed
schema.description: The number of metrics that did not meet target under Customer Service Performance type.

schema.name: metric_type
schema.description: Type of metric: Fulfillment Performance = 1 Listing Performance = 2 Customer Service Performance = 3

schema.name: metric_id
schema.description: ID of metric. If metric_id < 0, it means that this is not a real metric, but a group of metrics. Non-Responded Chats = -1 Late Shipment Rate (All Channels) = 1 Non-Fulfilment Rate (All Channels) = 3 Preparation Time = 4 Chat Response Rate = 11 Pre-order Listing % = 12 Days of Pre-order Listing Violation = 15 Response Time = 21 Shop Rating = 22 No. of Non-Responded Chats = 23 Fast Handover Rate = 25 On-time Pickup Failure Rate = 27 On-time Pickup Failure Rate Violation Value = 28 Average Response Time = 29 Cancellation Rate (All Channels) = 42 Return-refund Rate (All Channels) = 43 Severe Listing Violations = 52 Other Listing Violations = 53 Prohibited Listings = 54 Counterfeit/IP infringement = 55 Spam Listings = 56 Late Shipment Rate (NDD) = 85 Non-fulfilment Rate (NDD) = 88 Cancellation Rate (NDD) = 91 Return-refund Rate (NDD) = 92 Customer Satisfaction = 95 % SDD Listings = 96 % NDD Listings = 97 Fast Handover Rate - SLS = 2001 Fast Handover Rate - FBS = 2002 Fast Handover Rate - 3PF = 2003 Poor Quality Products = 2011

schema.name: current_period
schema.description: The performance of the metric at current period.

schema.name: last_period
schema.description: The performance of the metric at last period.

schema.name: unit
schema.description: Unit of metric: Number = 1 Percentage = 2 Second = 3 Day = 4 Hour = 5

schema.name: exemption_end_date
schema.description: (Only for whitelist TW sellers) The exemption_end_date value will not be empty if ALL conditions are met: - The shop is in the "POL Shop Whitelist" - Within the "Exemption Period" - The metric_id is 12 (Pre-order Listing %) or 15 (Days of Pre-order Listing Violation)
